title: Smart Data Recovery v3.9 Portable
description:
Smart Data Recovery for Windows 2000/NT/ME/XP/2003/Vista
------------------------------------------------------------------------

  Smart Data Recovery is a data recovery tool for Windows operating 
system that supports the FAT and NTFS file system. The software easily 
recovers data from hard disks, digital cameras, and any type of 
storage media - flash drives, USB drives, memory stick, PC card, 
multimedia card, secure digital card and diskette.  

  Smart Data Recovery can recover any deleted files, including 
MS Office files,photos, mp3 and zip files.

 The software enables to remove the data concerning deleted files. 
Thus nobody will be able to recover the data deleted by you and use 
it in own interest.

---------------------------[Smart PC Solutions]-------------------------




The Package contains a first version of the program made portable w/ the batch file that launchs the program converted to an EXE with QBFC to avoid showing the relative DOS window, but that some AVs see sometimes as a virus. If your AV is one of them, or if you don&#039;t trust too much to it, use the second one that runs directly the batch file. You will have the sloppy DOS window in the background but less complaints from antiviruses...


Enjoy and remember to seed... :o)
